pullrequest.title: adding Model::CreateJoint method that actually adds the joint to Model::joints member variable.

content.raw:
taking a closer look at `PhysicsEngine::CreateJoint`, more specifically [ODEPhysics::CreateJoint](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/84edb8acc2f355a062dcda291576a5000b312c96/gazebo/physics/ode/ODEPhysics.cc?at=issue_1077&fileviewer=file-view-default#ODEPhysics.cc-687), this call is much lower level than what I was looking for.
Going forward, we'll tutorialize the call through the new `Model::CreateJoint` proposed in this branch as the preferred API for model manipulation.
content.html: taking a closer look at PhysicsEngine::CreateJoint, more specifically ODEPhysics::CreateJoint, this call is much lower level than what I was looking for. Going forward, we'll tutorialize the call through the new Model::CreateJoint proposed in this branch as the preferred API for model manipulation.
